data.comment: Luton kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Lukas Jutkiewicz.
In the minute 37, Matty Pearson is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Birmingham with the kick-off.
In the minute 49, Harlee Dean (Birmingham) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
Ivan Sanchez is on a sub for Gary Gardner for Birmingham.
Nathan Jones is making the team's first substitution at Kenilworth Road with George Moncur replacing Elliott Lee.
In the minute 70, Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Clark replacing Harry Cornick.
Glen Rea (Luton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Scott Hogan with Jeremie Bela. This is the second substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
In the minute 74, Riley McGree is replacing Jake Clarke-Salter for Birmingham at Kenilworth Road.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
